channel.title: 317 delta, npc trading, and changing tab icon and gates
channel.description:
okay so, i need a tut on how to make it so when u right click an npc to trade it u don't have to hit talk because trade doesn't always work. also on my client (probably in models) the summoning tab is all weird (weird pic) i want to change it back to normal? but it has like 500 models i don't want to lose them all even though they all suck. any ideas? and umm the gates you know how they sometimes look like skulls, how can i change that back
thanks
